H0.text: What is the most popular ice cream flavor in America. Chocolate

H1.text: What is the most popular ice cream flavor in America. Cookies and Cream

H2.text: What is the most popular ice cream flavor in America. Mint Chocolate Chip

H3.text: What is the most popular ice cream flavor in America. Vanila

A4.text: According to the NPD Group, the most popular ice cream flavours in the U.S. are vanilla and chocolate with a combined market share of 40% as of 2008.
